subtasks.title: Obtain Digital Terrain Model (DTM) for QGIS mapping, initial turbine layout, contour lines, and planning area (WGS 84 UTM 19N)
Use Cursor IDE and Vibe coding to produce maps for turbine positioning, wake losses, and shading tower losses (QGIS python or Geopandas)
Obtain Virtual wind data from Vortex Series and parse into timeseries dataframe
Calculate Energy production without wake loss using N6.x powercurve and wbls stats (ParkOptimizer or NREL Floris)
Calculate Energy production with wake loss (ParkOptimizer or NREL Floris)
Assess wind stats and compare with global wind atlas info for quality check
Indicate roads and access infrastructure for turbines and crane pads (27.5x40m for 6MW turbines)
Include substation and own consumption details (690V/22kV, 1-1.5% own consumption)
Obtain representative hourly price data from DE Latam
Include solar PV production and calculate total hourly revenues
Note dynamic shading losses from flickering (to be addressed in next phase)
Estimate overall production and revenue without BESS
Estimate revenue with BESS (50% of solar PV capacity, perfect foresight)
Formulate and solve optimal BESS operation using OR/LP methods (PYOMO)
